activity_differential: person cooking pancakes over open fire
person frying food in pan outdoors
description: A person is cooking over an open fire using a pan, with logs as fuel. The person manipulates the firewood and tends to the cooking process, while pancakes are being fried in the pan.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Typically, a fabric would lie on top of a log, not below it; reversing subject and object corrects the spatial relationship.
